sentences.sContent: No one could console her when Peter died.
sentences.sCn: 彼得去世时没人能够安慰她。

sentences.sContent: ...can console themselves with the knowledge that college is an investment that...

phrases.pCn: 游戏控制台；携带型电脑游戏

remMethod.val: con(共同) ＋ sole(孤单) → 孤单的人们互相安慰 → 安慰

words.tran: 安慰；慰问；起安慰作用的人或事物

trans.tranOther: to make someone feel better when they are feeling sad or disappointed
a flat board that contains the controls for a machine, piece of electrical equipment, computer etc
